card.name: Civilians
card.text: Heroes cannot use powers. At the start of the environment turn, each player may discard 1 card each to destroy this card

card.name: Rooftops
card.text: Increase all damage by 1. At the end of their turn, 1 player may discard 2 cards to destroy this card

card.name: Attention
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, reveal the top card of every deck, starting at the villain deck and going clockwise. If the revealed card is a target, put it into play. Otherwise, shuffle it back into its deck. Then, destroy this card

card.name: The Boardwalk
card.text: When this card enters play, destroy all other Suburb cards. Reduce damage dealt to environment targets by 1

card.name: The Docks
card.text: When this card enters play, destroy all other Suburb cards. Increase damage dealt by environment targets by 1

card.name: The Outskirts
card.text: When this card enters play, destroy all other Suburb cards. At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck

card.name: PRT Squad
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage

card.name: Scum
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the second highest HP X projectile damage, where X = the number of Scum in play * 2

card.name: Uber
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the highest HP 2 melee damage. Then, if Leet is in play, Uber and Leet regain 1 HP

card.name: Leet
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP 2 lightning damage. If Uber is in play, increase damage dealt by Uber and Leet by 1
